item.title: Retail sales rose a better-than-expected 0.6% in November
item.description: Shoppers increased their spending in November from October as holiday shopping kicked into full gear

item.title: Producer prices rise a mild 0.2% in November, government says in report delayed by federal shutdown
item.description: U.S. wholesale prices rose modestly in November, the government said in report delayed by federal shutdown

item.title: Luxury retailer Saks Global files for bankruptcy as it prepares to restructure
item.description: Luxury retailer Saks Global has filed for bankruptcy, preparing to reposition itself after obtaining about $1.75 billion in financing commitments

item.title: Canadian PM Mark Carney arrives in Beijing for landmark four-day visit to China
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney arrives in Beijing, aiming to repair relations with China

item.title: Developer of New York offshore wind farm is asking a federal judge to spare it from Trump
item.description: A federal judge is expected to consider whether to set aside a Trump administration order pausing the construction of a major offshore project for New...
